definition: an unfortunate development, surpass or beat by a wide margin
details:
noun
- an unfortunate development
= synonyms: pity
- a painful emotion resulting from an awareness of inadequacy or guilt
- a state of dishonor
= example: a state of dishonor
= synonyms: disgrace, ignominy
verb
- surpass or beat by a wide margin
- cause to be ashamed
- compel through a sense of shame
= example: compel through a sense of shame
- bring shame or dishonor upon
= synonyms: dishonor
